descr: "A record of a request for diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a ProcedureRequest resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "Identifiers assigned to this order instance by the orderer and/or the receiver and/or order fulfiller."

fields.name: definition
fields.descr: "Protocol or definition followed by this request."

fields.name: basedOn
fields.descr: "Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request."

fields.name: replaces
fields.descr: "The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s)."

fields.name: requisition
fields.descr: "A shared identifier common to all procedure or diagnostic requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the composite or group identifier."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of the order."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: intent
fields.descr: "Whether the request is a proposal, plan, an original order or a reflex order."

fields.name: _intent
fields.descr: "Extensions for intent"

fields.name: priority
fields.descr: "Indicates how quickly the ProcedureRequest should be addressed with respect to other requests."

fields.name: _priority
fields.descr: "Extensions for priority"

fields.name: doNotPerform
fields.descr: "Set this to true if the record is saying that the procedure should NOT be performed."

fields.name: _doNotPerform
fields.descr: "Extensions for doNotPerform"

fields.name: category
fields.descr: "A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. \"Surgical Procedure\")."

fields.name: code
fields.descr: "A code that identifies a particular procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations, that have been requested."

fields.name: subject
fields.descr: "On whom or what the procedure or diagnostic is to be performed. This is usually a human patient, but can also be requested on animals, groups of humans or animals, devices such as dialysis machines, or even locations (typically for environmental scans)."

fields.name: context
fields.descr: "An encounter or episode of care that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made."

fields.name: occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "The date/time at which the diagnostic testing should occur."

fields.name: _occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "Extensions for occurrenceDateTime"

fields.name: occurrencePeriod
fields.descr: "The date/time at which the diagnostic testing should occur."

fields.name: occurrenceTiming
fields.descr: "The date/time at which the diagnostic testing should occur."

fields.name: asNeededBoolean
fields.descr: "If a CodeableConcept is present, it indicates the pre-condition for performing the procedure.  For example \"pain\", \"on flare-up\", etc."

fields.name: _asNeededBoolean
fields.descr: "Extensions for asNeededBoolean"

fields.name: asNeededCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "If a CodeableConcept is present, it indicates the pre-condition for performing the procedure.  For example \"pain\", \"on flare-up\", etc."

fields.name: authoredOn
fields.descr: "When the request transitioned to being actionable."

fields.name: _authoredOn
fields.descr: "Extensions for authoredOn"

fields.name: requester
fields.descr: "The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation."

fields.name: performerType
fields.descr: "Desired type of performer for doing the diagnostic testing."

fields.name: performer
fields.descr: "The desired perfomer for doing the diagnostic testing.  For example, the surgeon, dermatopathologist, endoscopist, etc."

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.descr: "An explanation or justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested in coded or textual form.   This is often for billing purposes.  May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation."

fields.name: reasonReference
fields.descr: "Indicates another resource that provides a justification for why this diagnostic investigation is being requested.   May relate to the resources referred to in supportingInformation."

fields.name: supportingInfo
fields.descr: "Additional clinical information about the patient or specimen that may influence the procedure or diagnostics or their interpretations.     This information includes diagnosis, clinical findings and other observations.  In laboratory ordering these are typically referred to as \"ask at order entry questions (AOEs)\".  This includes observations explicitly requested by the producer (filler) to provide context or supporting information needed to complete the order. For example,  reporting the amount of inspired oxygen for blood gas measurements."

fields.name: specimen
fields.descr: "One or more specimens that the laboratory procedure will use."

fields.name: bodySite
fields.descr: "Anatomic location where the procedure should be performed. This is the target site."

fields.name: note
fields.descr: "Any other notes and comments made about the service request. For example, letting provider know that \"patient hates needles\" or other provider instructions."

fields.name: relevantHistory
fields.descr: "Key events in the history of the request."
